name: Bird ↔ Throne
description: Flyer brings feet to base's shins, base bends knees, flyer stands up.

name: Bird ↔ Front Plank
description: Base moves feet up to flyer's shoulders, flyer straightens body.

name: Bird ↔ Star
description: Base splits feet to hip and shoulder, flyer opens up.

name: Bird ↔ Folded Leaf
description: Flyer folds forward bringing hands toward base's head.

name: Throne → Shoulder Stand
description: Flyer dives forward, base catches shoulders, flyer inverts.

name: Throne ↔ Reverse Throne
description: Flyer rotates 180 degrees while standing on base's feet.

name: Shoulder Stand ↔ Straddlebat
description: From inverted shoulder stand, base adjusts feet to inner thighs for straddlebat.

name: Throne ↔ Chair
description: Flyer sits down on base's feet, transitioning from standing to seated position.

name: Chair ↔ Whale
description: Base removes one foot, flyer arches sideways into whale.

name: Whale ↔ Vishnu's Couch (Left)
description: Flyer transitions from arched whale to relaxed side-lying position on left side.

name: Whale ↔ Vishnu's Couch (Right)
description: Flyer transitions from arched whale to relaxed side-lying position on right side.

name: Straddlebat ↔ Side Star (Left)
description: Flyer rotates from upside-down to sideways left as base adjusts feet.

name: Straddlebat ↔ Side Star (Right)
description: Flyer rotates from upside-down to sideways right as base adjusts feet.

name: Side Star (Left) ↔ Reverse Bird
description: Flyer rotates from left side to face-up as base brings feet together.

name: Side Star (Right) ↔ Reverse Bird
description: Flyer rotates from right side to face-up as base brings feet together.

name: Star ↔ Mono Reverse Shin (Left)
description: From star, base lowers right foot, flyer shifts to left leg, connects hands.

name: Star ↔ Mono Reverse Shin (Right)
description: From star, base lowers left foot, flyer shifts to right leg, connects hands.

name: Mono Reverse Shin ↔ Supported Kneepit (Left)
description: Flyer transitions shin to knee pit while maintaining hand support.

name: Mono Reverse Shin ↔ Supported Kneepit (Right)
description: Flyer transitions shin to knee pit while maintaining hand support.

name: Supported Kneepit ↔ Mono Backbird (Left)
description: Flyer extends leg from knee pit to horizontal backbird position.

name: Supported Kneepit ↔ Mono Backbird (Right)
description: Flyer extends leg from knee pit to horizontal backbird position.

name: Mono Backbird ↔ Star (Left)
description: Base adds second foot to flyer's shoulder, returning to star position.

name: Mono Backbird ↔ Star (Right)
description: Base adds second foot to flyer's shoulder, returning to star position.
